verses.verse: And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Shechem <S%H7927><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his mother's <S%H517><s%> brethren, <S%H251><s%> and communed <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H413><s%> them, and with <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of his mother's <S%H517><s%> father, <S%H1><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak, <S%H1696><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> Whether <S%H4100><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> for you, either that all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> which are threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> persons, <S%H376><s%> reign <S%H4910><s%> over you, or <S%H518><s%> that one <S%H259><s%> reign <S%H4910><s%> over you? remember <S%H2142><s%> also that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am your bone <S%H6106><s%> and your flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

And his mother's <S%H517><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> him in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words: <S%H1697><s%> and their hearts <S%H3820><s%> inclined to follow <S%H5186><s%> <S%H310><s%> Abimelech; <S%H40><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> He <S%H1931><s%> is our brother. <S%H251><s%>

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> him threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%> out of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of Baal-berith, <S%H1170><s%> wherewith Abimelech <S%H40><s%> hired <S%H7936><s%> vain <S%H7386><s%> and light <S%H6348><s%> persons, <S%H376><s%> which followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

And he went <S%H935><s%> unto his father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> at Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H853><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> being threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> persons, <S%H376><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> one <S%H259><s%> stone: <S%H68><s%> notwithstanding yet Jotham <S%H3147><s%> the youngest <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> was left; <S%H3498><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he hid himself. <S%H2244><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> gathered together, <S%H622><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the house of Millo, <S%H1037><s%> and went, <S%H1980><s%> and made <S%H4427><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king, <S%H4428><s%> by <S%H5973><s%> the plain <S%H436><s%> of the pillar <S%H5324><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

And when they told <S%H5046><s%> it to Jotham, <S%H3147><s%> he went <S%H1980><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the top <S%H7218><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim, <S%H1630><s%> and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and cried, <S%H7121><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, ye men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> may hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you.

The trees <S%H6086><s%> went forth <S%H1980><s%> <S%H1980><s%> on a time to anoint <S%H4886><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them; and they said <S%H559><s%> unto the olive tree, <S%H2132><s%> Reign <S%H4427><s%> thou over <S%H5921><s%> us.

But the olive tree <S%H2132><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Should I leave <S%H2308><s%> <S%H853><s%> my fatness, <S%H1880><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> by me they honor <S%H3513><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and man, <S%H376><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to be promoted <S%H5128><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the trees? <S%H6086><s%>
And the trees <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the fig tree, <S%H8384><s%> Come <S%H1980><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us.

But the fig tree <S%H8384><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Should I forsake <S%H2308><s%> <S%H853><s%> my sweetness, <S%H4987><s%> and my good <S%H2896><s%> fruit, <S%H8570><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to be promoted <S%H5128><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the trees? <S%H6086><s%>
Then said <S%H559><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> unto the vine, <S%H1612><s%> Come <S%H1980><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us.

And the vine <S%H1612><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Should I leave <S%H2308><s%> <S%H853><s%> my wine, <S%H8492><s%> which cheereth <S%H8055><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and man, <S%H376><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to be promoted <S%H5128><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the trees? <S%H6086><s%>
Then said <S%H559><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the bramble, <S%H329><s%> Come <S%H1980><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us.

And the bramble <S%H329><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the trees, <S%H6086><s%> If <S%H518><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> anoint <S%H4886><s%> me king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, then come <S%H935><s%> and put your trust <S%H2620><s%> in my shadow: <S%H6738><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> not, <S%H369><s%> let fire <S%H784><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the bramble, <S%H329><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, if <S%H518><s%> ye have done <S%H6213><s%> truly <S%H571><s%> and sincerely, <S%H8549><s%> in that ye have made Abimelech king, <S%H4427><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H40><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> ye have dealt <S%H6213><s%> well <S%H2896><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> and his house, <S%H1004><s%> and have done <S%H6213><s%> unto him according to the deserving <S%H1576><s%> of his hands; <S%H3027><s%>

(For <S%H834><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> you, and adventured <S%H7993><s%> <S%H853><s%> his life <S%H5315><s%> far, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5048><s%> and delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of Midian: <S%H4080><s%>

And ye <S%H859><s%> are risen up <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> my father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> and have slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> persons, <S%H376><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> one <S%H259><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> and have made <S%H853><s%> Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of his maidservant, <S%H519><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is your brother;) <S%H251><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> ye then have dealt <S%H6213><s%> truly <S%H571><s%> and sincerely <S%H8549><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> and with <S%H5973><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> then rejoice <S%H8055><s%> ye in Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and let him <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in you:

But if <S%H518><s%> not, <S%H369><s%> let fire <S%H784><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%> from Abimelech, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H40><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo; <S%H4407><s%> and let fire <S%H784><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%> from the men <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and from the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of Millo, <S%H4407><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Jotham <S%H3147><s%> ran away, <S%H5127><s%> and fled, <S%H1272><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to Beer, <S%H876><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> for fear <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of Abimelech <S%H40><s%> his brother. <S%H251><s%>
When Abimelech <S%H40><s%> had reigned <S%H7786><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> with Abimelech: <S%H40><s%>

That the cruelty <S%H2555><s%> done to the threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> might come, <S%H935><s%> and their blood <S%H1818><s%> be laid <S%H7760><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> their brother, <S%H251><s%> which <S%H834><s%> slew <S%H2026><s%> them; and upon <S%H5921><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> which <S%H834><s%> aided <S%H2388><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> him in the killing <S%H2026><s%> of <S%H853><s%> his brethren. <S%H251><s%>

And the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> liers in wait <S%H693><s%> for him in <S%H5921><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and they robbed <S%H1497><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> came along <S%H5674><s%> that way <S%H1870><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> them: and it was told <S%H5046><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with his brethren, <S%H251><s%> and went over <S%H5674><s%> to Shechem: <S%H7927><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> put their confidence <S%H982><s%> in him.

And they went out <S%H3318><s%> into the fields, <S%H7704><s%> and gathered <S%H1219><s%> <S%H853><s%> their vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and trod <S%H1869><s%> the grapes, and made <S%H6213><s%> merry, <S%H1974><s%> and went into <S%H935><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of their god, <S%H430><s%> and did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink, <S%H8354><s%> and cursed <S%H7043><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> is Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> we should serve <S%H5647><s%> him? is not <S%H3808><s%> he the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal? <S%H3378><s%> and Zebul <S%H2083><s%> his officer? <S%H6496><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Shechem: <S%H7928><s%> for why <S%H4069><s%> should we <S%H587><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> him?

And would to God <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> were under my hand! <S%H3027><s%> then would I remove <S%H5493><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%> And he said <S%H559><s%> to Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> Increase <S%H7235><s%> thine army, <S%H6635><s%> and come out. <S%H3318><s%>

And when Zebul <S%H2083><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed, <S%H5651><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled. <S%H2734><s%>

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> privily, <S%H8649><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> be come <S%H935><s%> to Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> they fortify <S%H6696><s%> <S%H853><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore up <S%H6965><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is with <S%H854><s%> thee, and lie in wait <S%H693><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%>

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> that in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> as soon as the sun <S%H8121><s%> is up, <S%H2224><s%> thou shalt rise early, <S%H7925><s%> and set <S%H6584><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the city: <S%H5892><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> when he <S%H1931><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is with <S%H854><s%> him come out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H413><s%> thee, then mayest thou do <S%H6213><s%> to them as <S%H834><s%> thou shalt find <S%H4672><s%> occasion. <S%H3027><s%>

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H5973><s%> him, by night, <S%H3915><s%> and they laid wait <S%H693><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> in four <S%H702><s%> companies. <S%H7218><s%>

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city: <S%H5892><s%> and Abimelech <S%H40><s%> rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H854><s%> him, from <S%H4480><s%> lying in wait. <S%H3993><s%>

And when Gaal <S%H1603><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Zebul, <S%H2083><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> there come people down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H5971><s%> from the top <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%> And Zebul <S%H2083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Thou <S%H859><s%> seest <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> as if they were men. <S%H376><s%>

And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> See <S%H2009><s%> there come people down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H5971><s%> by <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> the middle <S%H2872><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> company <S%H7218><s%> come <S%H935><s%> along by <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> the plain <S%H436><s%> of Meonenim. <S%H6049><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Zebul <S%H2083><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Where <S%H346><s%> is now <S%H645><s%> thy mouth, <S%H6310><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> thou saidst, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> we should serve <S%H5647><s%> him? is not <S%H3808><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou hast despised? <S%H3988><s%> go out, <S%H3318><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> with them.
And Gaal <S%H1603><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> chased <S%H7291><s%> him, and he fled <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, and many <S%H7227><s%> were overthrown <S%H5307><s%> and wounded, <S%H2491><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate. <S%H8179><s%>

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Arumah: <S%H725><s%> and Zebul <S%H2083><s%> thrust out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H853><s%> Gaal <S%H1603><s%> and his brethren, <S%H251><s%> that they should not dwell <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3427><s%> in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> on the morrow, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4283><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> into the field; <S%H7704><s%> and they told <S%H5046><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>
